With the current config and cache provided with the mod I get this:

Nice update. The galaxy is really huge. Wow. Thank you for sharing.

 By the way I found something in the OPM threat about caching that would fit also to this mod.

> 
> ....... that allows Kopernicus Body nodes to specify a cacheFile property, which is a GameData relative path to the PQS cache file.
> So you should be able to do...
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>     Body{    name = Sarnus    cacheFile = OPM/KopernicusCache/Sarnus.bin}
> 
> 
> 
> 
> ...and distribute the cache files inside the OPM folder. This should be in the next version (after 0.0.7) of Kopernicus. This should make the entire OPM installation a single folder. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

With some changes future updates of KerbalGalaxy would be easier.

    Body{    name = Abbadon    cacheFile = KerbalGalaxy/Cache/Abbadon.bin}

or something like that.
